description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. An epic old school platform adventure in which Lemmy battles the Mecha-Eggs with his toxic spit, ninja kick and inventory full of consumable treats. Under the guidance of his Uncle Lenny he must venture across grassy plains and explore underground caverns to  grab the buglets and save the egglets on his way to his ultimate challenge: the Citadel!
